questions.quote: Rene, can you come here a second? Let me ask you something: Ummm, have you ever... you know... faked it?
I'll need you to write down your phone number on the check for me.  Perhaps you could do the same.
I'm starving! I can feel my stomach sucking up against my spine.
Well, that's it! Tonight's the night. I'm getting one. No "if and's or but's".
You! Take off your socks, your pants, your underwear. We're doing the wash. C'mon! Take it off, take it off!
Make-up sex? You have to have that right after the fight, we're way past that.
That?s what I?ll do, I?ll just call him and tell him, I?ll tell him. That?s all I?ll do. He's a human being, I?ll talk to him. He'll understand. Right?
Well, what about you? You told me that you were engaged. What was the rest of that?
I'm not really going away, I told you I'd be back every other weekend.
In your laundry the whole time? I told you not to mix in our guys. What did we figure the damage on that machine would be?
